# Triplot

{{doc triplot}}

## Delaunay triangulation


```{julia}
#| echo: true
#| output: true
using GMT
triplot(rand(10,3), lc=:red, title="Delaunay", show=true)
```


<!--
## Voronoi cells

Create and plot a Delaunay triangulation from a set of 2-D points.


```{julia}
#| echo: true
#| output: true
using GMT
triplot(rand(10,2), voronoi=true, title="Voronoi", show=true)
```
